name: AVVideoFieldMode
desc: Constants indicating video field mode, for use with the videoFieldMode  property.

items.name: case both
items.desc: Indicates that both top and bottom video fields in interlaced content should be passed through.

items.name: case topOnly
items.desc: Indicates that only the top video field in interlaced content should be passed through.

items.name: case bottomOnly
items.desc: Indicates that the bottom video field only in interlaced content should be passed through.

items.name: case deinterlace
items.desc: Indicates that top and bottom video fields in interlaced content should be deinterlaced.
